title: Business Analyst
description:
Responsibilities


Engaging with clients directly - driving initial scope discussions as well as working with the delivery and sales team on quotes and proposals.
Schedule and lead workshops with the client to understand, define, and document their business requirements.
Provide quality proposals that articulate the customer's needs and fulfill the customer's requirements.
Collaborate with the Solution Architect and other team members to confirm the solution design approach for the project.
Involved in preparing presentations for prospective clients to position the company's services and offerings.
Work closely with sales teams in the pursuit of new business.


Requirements


1+ years experience as a business analyst or as a presales consultant.
Experience with Commerce, Marketing, or CRM software implementation.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to set priorities and meet deadlines in a dynamic, autonomous environment.
Ability to work in a highly dynamic team and fast-paced environment with continuous challenges.
